title: Post-Deposition In-Situ Passivation of AgBiS2 Nanocrystal Inks for High-Efficiency Ultra-Thin Solar Cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE03266G, Paper
Jae Taek Oh, Yongjie Wang, Carmelita Rod√°, Debranjan Mandal, Gaurav Kumar, Guy Luke Whitworth, Gerasimos Konstantatos
Ternary chalcogenide AgBiS2 nanocrystals (NCs) have emerged as a new environmentally friendly material for non-toxic solution-processed solar cells, with a record efficiency of ~9%. To date, however, this has been...
